posts.post_content:
Hi, there. Looking for an example to add to my type collection. Would like:

--star or minor HOF (especially Fred Clarke)
--EX condition, graded or raw (although I prefer graded).

Thanks for looking!

[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20241104/aad89bd452e1fae3a61783da81310d3f.jpg[/IMG]
I have a complete T201 set with 2 Cobbs. Take your pick. 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
